duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify audit process improvements to increase productivity, efficiency and contribution to economic profit without impacting effectiveness.
Prepare and assist in the development the annual audit plan and management of a successful completion of the plan.
Conduct quarterly risk and fraud assessments based on input from management, external auditors, and external factors for the development of quarterly audit plans.
Maintain an in-depth understanding of business areas and supporting functions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field (Master's preferred)
